attributes.action: MPs receiving custodial sentence to be dismissed and a bi-election triggered
attributes.additional_details: This comes from the disgraced Peterborough MP Fiona Onasanya.
attributes.background:
The recall act 2015 should be updated to include a clause that if an MP receives a custodial sentence, it is grounds for immediate dismissed and a bi-election called for the constituency seat.

It is unethical for an MP represent constituents from a prison cell
